[Global Namespace]::​CustomKeyvalues
class CustomKeyvalues {...}

Custom keyvalues. Do not keep handles to instances of these objects.

Functions
SetKeyvalue
bool SetKeyvalue(
const string& in szKey,
const string& in szValue
)

Sets a custom keyvalue to the given string value.

Returns true if the key existed and was overwritten.

Returns true if the key existed and was overwritten.

GetKeyvalue
CustomKeyvalue GetKeyvalue(
const string& in szKey

Gets the keyvalue with the given name. Check if it exists by calling Exists.
